name: Aztec: The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold
name_original: Aztec: The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold
description: Aztec: The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold (also known as The Sacred Amulet) is an adventure game designed for PlayStation. It was developed by Cryo Interactive and published by France Telecom Multimedia on 1 June 2000.
